amendment.description: Amendment allows elderly and disabled residents living in Federally-assisted housing to keep a common household pet.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 as printed in the Congressional Record to expand the application of allowable pet ownership by elderly or disabled residents to cover elderly families living in federally assisted housing.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Mrs. Maloney demanded a separate vote on the Maloney amendment (A009).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 375 - 48 (Roll no. 159).
